item.title: A BI Tool for Self-Insured Co's
item.description: Understanding User Workflows in Complex B2B Software Overview âŠ• Themes: Human Computer Interaction, User Research A few designers were hired by a 100 person company. The company was engineering/data driven, and now started to see the cracks in having a UI that was built for internal users that was a 1:1 representation of the underlying data model. The two designers were the first designers to take a look at the UI since the conception of the product.
